Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
Template variants is a set of advanced configuration possibilites built into OpenCms to customize generic OpenCms templates like the standard template Mercury.

If you start building a OpenCms website, you usually do not start from scratch but you further develop an existing generic template.

Generic templates save time and money. Though, by reaching the widest possible circle of users, they sometimes tend to provide too much choices and functionality for the content editor.

Also, there is probably no website project that has requirements not going beyond those of the generic template.

You reach a higher degree of compatibility with template variants. You can update to the latest Mercury version at any time while at the same time devloping individual customer functionality.
